product_name: Coleman Deluxe Propane Lantern with Hard-Shell Case
long_description: Don't let the setting sun end your campsite fun! Fire up the Coleman Deluxe Propane lantern with hard-shell case for lots of light and hours of enjoyment. Lantern uses two #21 string-tie mantles (included) to emit a light intensity of 967 lumens to illuminate your campsite; lantern lights easily with a match (sold separately). Use the dial on front to adjust the light intensity to suit your needs. PerfectFlow(TM) propane pressure control system regulates fuel flow for constant output regardless of temperature, altitude or fuel level. Base features feet that fold out to increase stability; fold the sides back in when packing to increase compactness. Bail-style handle lets you easily transport the lantern. Included hard case protects the lantern during transportation and storage. Coleman Deluxe Propane lantern with hard-shell case operates on one 16.4-oz. propane canister, sold separately; 1 canister provides about 8 hrs. of use. Due to flammable item shipping restrictions, we cannot sell fuel canisters online; they are available at REI retail stores.
short_description: Don't let the setting sun end your campsite fun! Fire up the Coleman Deluxe Propane lantern with hard-shell case for lots of light and hours of enjoyment.
